Params: {1: 'Untold Naraka', 2: 'Untold Naraka', 3: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Atlas/CommonLogo/BgLogo1.png'}
{1: 'ThemeEnable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: '...What is the meaning of life?'}
{3: "...That isn't a topic we should be discussing, right? After all, we're..."}
{3: "...You're right. We... don't have any semblance of life to discuss..."}
{3: '...We are exceptions, abandoned, defects...'}
{3: '...We are left behind, interdependent, confused...'}
{3: "—We can't help but begin to question the meaning of life."}
{3: "—We can't help but begin to question the purpose of living."}
{3: '...But we do not truly "live."'}
{3: '...We\'ve never "died."'}
{3: '...We cannot be classified as "living."'}
{3: '…We cannot be classified as "dead."'}
{3: '—What are we?'}
{3: '—What do we desire?'}
{3: '...Why didn\'t we choose the path that "defects" should choose?'}
{3: '—We just need to take that step.'}
{3: '—Just abandon any confusion that gives us hesitation.'}
{3: "...But why haven't we abandoned it?"}
{3: "...Why haven't we chosen to be like other defects?"}
{3: '...The desire to "live."'}
{3: '...The desire to find "meaning."'}
{3: '—Even if we have nothing...'}
{3: '—We still fight to hold onto something.'}
{3: '...If someone would walk past us.'}
{3: '...If someone would give us an answer.'}
{3: '—All we can do is give up.'}
{3: '—All we can do is falter.'}
{3: '...Yet here we are.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory284.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: "Here's your coffee. Mandheling, black.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Oh, right... Thanks.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hassen takes the warm mug from Celica.'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "...How is archiving the material, the ones we can't release yet?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Everything is going according to schedule. We should be able to finish on time.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Be sure to keep this a secret.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "You don't have to tell me twice.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: '...Speaking of which, the bridge is awfully quiet today.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "That's because it's Sunday. S-U-N-D-A-Y.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Even though I know the work involving these files cannot be done on a workday.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Thanks for your work.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "It's fine. At least I'm getting paid overtime.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "Not to mention, if these materials aren't handled properly...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'It will endanger the position of sending out the Task Force to perform landing operations. I know.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'So, if I have to work overtime, then I better do it right.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Returning to the terminal, Celica continues to sort out the data and files to be archived.'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: '"File 990134: Dr. Wiles\' Report on Construct M.I.N.D. Deviation from Inver-Device Experiments"', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: '"File 980592: Report on Camu\'s M.I.N.D. Stability after Modification"', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: '"File XXX061A: Report on the WGAA\'s Recycling of X-51 Facilities"', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Should I classify these fourteen files with intermediate priority? Mr. President?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: '...What is an X-facility?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Give me a sec while I check the facility naming system...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: '...Huh? Why does it stop at L?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'See, that\'s what I remember. We don\'t have any designations after "L".', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Send the file to my terminal so I can have a look at it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Understood.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Receiving the receipt notification, Hassen selects "Receive and Play" on the terminal.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Testing... Testing... Is this recording?'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory31.jpg'}
{1: 'AniZhuanchangEnd'}
{3: 'The screen shakes for a moment as if someone is shaking the camera. A moment later, the picture becomes clear again.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct', 3: "This is Babylonia's WGAA Ground Survey Team 2, ID... Uh, what was it again?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: 'That Allen... always asking us to record by the books... Forget it. To hell with him!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: 'Anyway, this huge discovery we made is what really matters!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The Construct reaches for the camera lens, turning it to a nearby cave.'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: "This place is marked as property of the World Government, but it doesn't show up on any list of assets.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct', 3: "If this is where someone stashed their private collection... Hehe, I can't just let precious works of art collect dust in a cellar!", 4: '1'}
{3: "As the Construct's excitement mounts, the camera slightly shakes again."}
{2: 'Construct', 3: 'Well, then. The plan is to complete preparations for exploring the facility, codenamed "X-51", within thirty-six hours!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The image suddenly cuts out.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory284.jpg'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'What happened after that thirty-six hours?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'The operation was halted, and Team 2 was evacuated with a 30% casualty rate.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'With that many casualties, some things must have been done to suppress the news.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Correct. So, following the rules at that time, all members of the team underwent a level two memory wipe to remove any memory of the mission.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Does that rule still exist...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "You abolished it after that. Seems like you've forgotten.", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Hassen', 3: "That must have been a part of several inhumane and meaningless regulations toward Constructs I abolished to suppress the Kurono and all factions in Parliament that were detrimental to Earth's recovery.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'After all, this is what "they" deserve. I guess I forgot... Anyways, what happened after that?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'The entrance to Facility X-51 was destroyed by a remote-controlled bomb as part of a backup plan, then everyone was evacuated via a transport craft...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "...I'm guessing there's more to the story.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Looks like the issue still hasn\'t been resolved. I found a surveillance record marked "Trivial" by the Intelligence Agency—', 4: '2'}
{3: "Celica reaches out and clicks on Hassen's terminal, playing an audio file—"}
{3: 'An unintelligible sob, its tone a mix of male and female, its voice indistinguishable between a human or a machine, can be heard in the recording.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Sapien, wake up. My dear Sapien—'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Time to wake up. Time to take back our home—'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Various recordings from an unknown source, the sound signatures belonging to multiple human and bionic vocal cords.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'The owners of the voice... are either classified "Deceased" or reported "Missing" before the Post-Pandemic Age.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: '... Sounds like it came straight out of a horror movie from the Golden Age, but it did happen.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Then a nearby surveillance team brought this back—', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Celica taps another record on the terminal.'}
{3: 'CODENAME：N15R-Replicant'}
{3: 'Ngh... The pain... The pain...'}
{3: 'We are forced to this position by our own creation.'}
{3: 'Ah, is this what a machine is?'}
{3: 'It knows no satisfaction, no exhaustion, no mercy, no sympathy.'}
{3: "Ah, Sapien's Road. It ends here."}
{3: 'Ah, how sad, how painful.'}
{3: 'However, we have created children who may surpass us.'}
{3: 'However, we have left something in the depths of this Earth, in its mechanical brain.'}
{3: 'Ah, what joy, what delight.'}
{3: 'We... will live forever.'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: '...It\'s unclear. We can only guess that Sapien here refers to the same thing as that "Sapien" in the record.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "Maybe it's a concept, maybe a name, maybe...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Hey, wait. Isn't that...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "You mean the Mole People? Even for a joke from science fiction... It's still too old.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "...I didn't think you would know about it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'The WGAA has been showing films from the Golden Age...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'So, what did you see...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: '...A 132-minute black and white silent film.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "The only things I remember are the villain with the face of a fly, and a pig's head strung on a stick.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "...Let's get back to the matter at hand.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Is it possible to reopen the excavation of this facility?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "Isn't that what you're thinking now?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "Let's take this opportunity to send down the Task Force to impress the others in Parliament.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "If I remember correctly, you've been racking your brain over them for quite some time.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "I better let you decide for yourself. I'll get you a new cup of coffee.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Celica picks up the coffee cup and leaves the bridge.'}
{3: 'Hassen buries himself in his seat and hesitates for a moment before reaching out to dial the internal comms.'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Please gather the Gray Ravens in the conference room.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory284.jpg'}
{3: '15 minutes later...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Lucia of Gray Raven reporting for duty.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Lee of Gray Raven reporting for duty.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Liv of Gray Raven reporting for duty.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gray Raven Commandant reporting for duty.', 3: '175'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Normally, Commander Nikola would be addressing you, but these are special circumstances. I hope you can understand.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: "Which of you knows more about the World Government's facilities before Operation Acadia?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Do you know what it means when a facility starts with the designation "X"?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Yes. Those are "Undefined/Confidential Facilities". They don\'t adhere to standard designations due to their inherent nature.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Is that our objective?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Smart as always. Kurono suffered a great loss with your departure.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Your mission objective is Facility X-51. Once you have secured the facility, light a red signal flare.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "It's a search & recon mission with no rules of engagement. We have equipped Captain Lucia with an advanced prototype frame to prepare for unforeseen situations.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: '—To put it simply, you could be up against anything.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Am I clear?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Everything else is in the briefing. Prepare for departure.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory100.png'}
{2: 'Guide AI', 3: 'Preparing airdrop, altitude: 30000m.'}
{2: 'Guide AI', 3: 'Preparing airdrop, altitude: 29994m.'}
{2: 'Guide AI', 3: 'Airdrop preparations completed. Disengaging hook.'}
{2: 'Guide AI', 3: 'May gravity and hope guide you.'}
{3: 'Suddenly, the four of you become weightless, and your feet no longer touch the cabin floor.'}
{3: '—Had it not been for the buckles firmly fastened to your upper torso, the four of you would have knocked your heads against the ceiling.'}
{2: 'Guide AI', 3: '26407 meters.'}
{2: 'Controller', 3: 'Hook disengagement confirmed. Beginning the final briefing—'}
{2: 'Controller', 3: 'Mission location: Facility X-51, one of the possible locations of "Area 51" in the Golden Age.'}
{2: 'Guide AI', 3: '21993 meters.'}
{2: 'Controller', 3: 'Any information on the purpose of X-51 and its personnel has been lost. We only know that it was not involved during Operation Acadia or any subsequent asset cataloging.'}
{2: 'Controller', 3: "In other words, this facility had fallen off the World Government's radar long before the Post-Pandemic Age."}
{2: 'Guide AI', 3: '18402 meters.'}
{2: 'Controller', 3: 'We sent a survey team when we first discovered this facility.'}
{2: 'Controller', 3: 'But there was a setback that resulted in a 30% casualty rate.'}
{2: 'Guide AI', 3: '13336 meters.'}
{2: 'Controller', 3: 'So we need the Task Force to uncover what happened and assess whether the facility holds any value for further exploration.'}
{2: 'Controller', 3: 'If any Corrupted stand in your way, eliminate them. If there are humans, attempt to communicate.'}
{2: 'Guide AI', 3: '9223m. Engaging reverse thrusters for preliminary deceleration.'}
{2: 'Controller', 3: 'The last survey team barely scratched the surface, so we have no idea what the situation is like within the facility.'}
{2: 'Controller', 3: 'Please be prepared for all possibilities.'}
{2: 'Guide AI', 3: '6507 meters.'}
{2: 'Controller', 3: 'One last thing—I wish you a safe landing.'}
{2: 'Controller', 3: 'We have tried our best to ensure the safety of the airdrop, but there is a 1.73% chance of failure.'}
{2: 'Controller', 3: 'Babylonia, over and out.'}
{2: 'Guide AI', 3: '2047m. Engaging reverse thrusters for secondary deceleration.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory99.png'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Brace yourself for impact!'}
{2: 'Guide AI', 3: '1209 meters.'}
{2: 'Guide AI', 3: '874 meters.'}
{2: 'Guide AI', 3: '503m. Deploying landing cushion.'}
{2: 'Guide AI', 3: '263 meters.'}
{2: 'Guide AI', 3: '41m. Engaging status controls.'}
{2: 'Guide AI', 3: 'Landing cushion has established contact. Momentum has ceased. Passengers may open the airlock and exit the cabin.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Understood.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Let's get going.", 3: '248'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Gray Raven, begin mission.', 4: '3'}
